arts.ttl: Serie A: Atalanta vs. Como – Confirmed line-ups
arts.sum: Ademola Lookman is called in to start his first Serie A match of the season...

A draw between the two teams in Bergamo has been missing since New Year`s Eve 1988, 1-1 in Serie A, sealed by goals from De Patre for the home side and Simone for the lariani (Como). There are 29 previous meetings in Bergamo between the two teams: 12 nerazzurri (Atalanta) wins, 12 draws and 5 lariani (Como) victories.

arts.sum: Ahead of Saturday’s MD6 clash, FootItalia has the Atalanta vs Como preview, prediction, betting tips, odds and more.
